name: Chuck Pebble
description:
The makers of the hit games Pony Dash and Hidden Objects 3d are back with a brand new free addictive
puzzle game Chuck Pebble
Jack is a lazy boy looking for a crazy puzzle game to break his boring and worst time killer. Jack found the
Chuck Pebble is the best fit to break his boring and worst time. Chuck Pebble is a puzzle game with a simple
game play to make all pebbles into same color. Here is the trick, click on one pebble to flip the adjacent
pebbles to opposite color. You need to continue till all pebbles turn to same color with in the number of
moves.
Top features of the puzzle game are:
1. All puzzles are Free to Play
2. Flip one pebble to turn adjacent pebble’s color. Pebbles comes with Red and Black
3. Nicely animated tile marbles to give you aesthetic looks
4. Backgrounds and Game layout matches the modern look of OS with classic tough puzzles
5. Core focus of the game is to challenge your brain so that you can replay the game to achieve better
scores
6. Optimized for iOS 8, iOS 7 and iPod touch displays
7. Game center for Leader boards
CAUTION:
NOT FOR THE DUMB PEOPLE
What to expect in future versions:
1. More puzzles to make arcade kind of game length
2. Don’t go mad if you are not able to solve the puzzle, check with friends using newly planned chat/share
option
3. Planned to add pebbles in White, Blue, Pink, Purple, Orange, Yellow color etc
4. Social integrations with Facebook and Twitter
